info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Transylvania and east central Jackson Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Brevard, or 6 miles south of Black Balsam Area, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Rosman, Gorges State Park, Balsam Grove, Wolf Mountain and Connestee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
